parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: AutopurgePurgeInterval
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: AutopurgeSnapRetainCount
parameters.description: A reserved parameter.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster.

parameters.name: ConfigAuthEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Resource Access Management (RAM) authentication for a configuration center. This parameter is valid for Nacos instances. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled.
*   `false`: disabled.

> Before you configure this parameter, you must call the QueryConfig operation to obtain the ConfigAuthSupported parameter value to check whether the instance supports the RAM authentication feature.

parameters.name: ConfigSecretEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable configuration encryption for a configuration center. This parameter is valid for Nacos instances. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled.
*   `false`: disabled.

> Before you configure this parameter, you must call the QueryConfig operation to obtain the ConfigSecretSupported parameter value to check whether the instance supports configuration encryption.

parameters.name: ConfigType
parameters.description: The format of the configuration. Supported formats include TEXT, JSON, XML, and HTML.

parameters.name: ExtendedTypesEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the time to live (TTL) configuration. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances.

parameters.name: InitLimit
parameters.description: The maximum connection duration of the instance. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance.

parameters.name: JuteMaxbuffer
parameters.description: The maximum amount of data on each node. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. The default maximum data amount on each node is 1 megabyte. Unit: bytes.

parameters.name: MCPEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Mesh Configuration Protocol (MCP). This parameter is valid for Nacos instances. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled.
*   `false`: disabled.

> Before you configure this parameter, you must call the QueryConfig operation to obtain the MCPSupported parameter value to check whether the instance supports MCP.

parameters.name: MaxClientCnxns
parameters.description:
The number of connections between a client and a server. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances.\
If this parameter is set to 0, no limits are imposed on the number of connections.

parameters.name: MaxSessionTimeout
parameters.description: The maximum timeout period. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: MinSessionTimeout
parameters.description: The minimum timeout period. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: NamingAuthEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable RAM authentication for a registry. This parameter is valid for Nacos instances. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled.
*   `false`: disabled.

> Before you configure this parameter, you must call the QueryConfig operation to obtain the NamingAuthSupporte parameter value to check whether the instance supports the RAM authentication feature.

parameters.name: OpenSuperAcl
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable super permissions. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Valid values:

*   `true`: enabled
*   `false`: disabled

parameters.name: PassWord
parameters.description:
The password that corresponds to the username.

> You must specify this parameter if OpenSuperAcl is set to true.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: SnapshotCount
parameters.description: The frequency for generating snapshots. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances.

parameters.name: SyncLimit
parameters.description: The connection timeout period of the instance. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TickTime
parameters.description: The time unit. This parameter is valid for ZooKeeper instances. Default value: 2000. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description:
The name of the user.

> You must specify this parameter if OpenSuperAcl is set to true.
